title: Topic 001 Question 093
body: You create a semantic model by using Microsoft Power BI Desktop. The model contains one security role named SalesRegionManager and the following tables:
You need to modify the model to ensure that users assigned the SalesRegionManager role cannot see a column named Address in SalesAddress.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
